Title: MVP: Foundation & Architecture
Body: Project scaffold, dependencies, tooling baseline, run instructions.

Title: MVP: Core Models & Persistence
Body: Skill/profile/settings models + robust JSON load/save and defaults.

Title: MVP: Tracker Engine
Body: Unified input contract + timer orchestration + core tests.

Title: Parity: Overlay Window
Body: Transparent overlay, timer rendering, warning overlay behavior.

Title: Parity: Input Capture Stack
Body: Global keyboard/mouse/gamepad adapters and unified router lifecycle.

Title: Parity: Main App UI
Body: Profiles CRUD, skill row editor, play/stop and preview controls.

Title: Release: UX & Desktop Behavior
Body: Options dialog parity, tray behavior, single-instance lock.

Title: Release: Packaging & CI
Body: PyInstaller pipeline, CI checks, release artifact generation.

Title: Release: Docs & Onboarding
Body: Contributor guide, architecture overview, troubleshooting playbook.

Title: Icebox: Nice-to-have Enhancements
Body: Future improvements, polish, optional feature ideas.
